entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (heroic_sd_intro_imperial.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_10: The Empire requires your services. A Star Destroyer captain has gone rogue and taken control of the ship. Your mission is to help the Empire regain control of that ship.
entries.s_14: A response worthy of the Empire.
entries.s_4: You have no business here. Begone.
entries.s_6: You are a credit to the Empire. But your task is not complete until you have regained control of the Star Destroyer.
entries.s_8: A Star Destroyer captain has gone rogue and taken control of the ship. Your mission is to help the Empire regain control of that ship.
